transcript:

Tumne meri rating ki band baja rakhi hai kya hai yaar ye.

Bhai tum kiya karo client sir aapke pass satisfied ka mere ko aayega. Hello.

Customer: Yes yes yes.

Customer: Yeah actually the service is good but the one thing is I am getting only Bangladesh related by leads yeah yeah leads.
Executive: So you are getting leads only related to Bangladesh.
Customer: Yeah Bangladesh that's one second one second let me let me let me check mam ji just give me one second.

Executive: Mam I am able to see a I am able to see a by lead from Saudi Arabia as well yeah definitely Bangladesh leads are much higher in comparison to other countries but I am able to see some Saudi Arabia countries by lead some Hong Kong one of lead from Hong Kong one of lead from Sri Lanka one of lead from Kuwait and one of lead from Thailand one of lead from Maldives one of lead from Indonesia so there are multiple countries available multiple countries leads available in the portal.
Customer: Yes yes but comparatively if you see.
Executive: Yeah comparatively Bangladesh leads are high I agree because I just checked and in first around first five leads I got from Bangladesh but when I scroll it down I am able to see on the third position I am able to see Saudi Arabia leads.
Executive: Then on the on the seventh position I am able to see one one more Saudi Arabia leads on the eighth position I am able to see Hong Kong leads I on the ninth position I am able to see the Sri Lanka leads so leads are available for other countries as well for example on the 10th position or the 11th position I am able to see the Kuwait leads so there are multiple leads available from other countries as well but yeah definitely comparatively Bangladesh leads are high you can do one thing mam you can you can share the feedback for that particular lead if you are not dealing in the Bangladesh you can make the note relevant to that by lead.
Customer: Okay okay yeah.
Executive: Yeah through auto correct.
Executive: Yeah mam there is a option into the can can you come online mam so I can guide guide you for that on the system.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Please send yeah I know how to do how to mark not relevant there.
Executive: Yeah there is a option that is not relevant and you just need to select the second option I do not deal in Bangladesh you will get a once you will click on the not relevant option some a drop down will open and there will be some options so you just need to select I do not deal in the Bangladesh.
Customer: Yes I do not deal in Bangladesh yes I then.
Executive: Yes you just need to select and if you will not relevant around five to six leads for the Bangladesh Bangladesh location Bangladesh country will get negative and in further in future you will not get preferably from the Bangladesh location you will not get leads preferably for example if none of countries leads available on the portal then you will able to see Bangladesh leads but preferably this this location will get blocked and this leads will not show preferably preferably you will get the leads from other countries.
Customer: Yeah I did that.
Customer: Yeah I did for two Bangladesh then I am doing it for third one let me see let me see.
Executive: Yeah please check in that way.
Customer: Then we will check.
Executive: Yeah one more thing one more thing I want to ask mam is Bangladesh location is not feasible for you are you not dealing with the Bangladesh.
Customer: No I because I tried so many customers one of them they actually one of them said they they talk about India whatever Indian government is doing I blocked that number.
Executive: Oh my god.
Customer: It's irrelevant question sir and also somebody is asking for hawala type of advance payment.
Executive: Okay okay mam I can understand.
Customer: Yeah yeah this this we don't deal.
Executive: Okay that's why you are ignoring that particular yeah that's that's not only for one person it happened for two to three they they say hawala type of payment options.
Executive: Okay I can understand mam apart from this apart from this one more thing mam actually yesterday we had discussion your account manager avnish kumar had discussion with your staff I think and you got a feedback message on your whatsapp right.
Customer: Yes yes.
Executive: And I think you shared a not satisfied feedback for that.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: I think yes so mam actually it was that that feedback was for the employee basically the employee had a discussion with you for example I am I am having a discussion with you and after the disconnecting the call you will get a mail you will get a feedback mail from India mart that how how is your discussion with your with our employee and are you satisfied with the employee discussion so that that feedback message or that feedback mail is for our ourself is for employees is for myself so please share the satisfied feedback for that.
Customer: Because they have to reply on time right I texted him morning he called me on.
Executive: Pardon mam actually your voice was very low.
Customer: I think him on whatsapp yesterday morning he contact me around evening.
Executive: Mam can you repeat again please.
Customer: I think on whatsapp yesterday morning.
Executive: Okay okay okay no issue mam I am just it's about the timing sir it's about the timing.
Customer: Okay okay okay mam so I am closing your concern actually I got a ticket I got a complaint that you are not satisfied with the employee so if you are satisfied with the employee.
Executive: Can I close that concern.
Customer: Yeah please close it it's all about timing sir yeah.
Executive: Okay okay no issue mam I am closing this concern apart from this you will get a mail of a feedback please mark mark that mail as satisfied.
Customer: Okay okay we that will be that that mail will be for me mam I have I am having a discussion with you is I am giving you some fruitful information or not that is around that that mail is around to that so please mark satisfied to that mail.
Customer: Okay okay we will check.
Executive: Okay mega mam apart from this that you have provided that should work right we have to wait two three.
Executive: One more thing one more thing one more thing mam can you share me your whatsapp number so I can share my personal number with you so you can send me a message message as well if you please for example in future if you face any problem related to India mart you can directly call me on my personal number and you can directly message me can you share me your whatsapp number mam please.
Customer: Whatsapp is available on the same number that you are.
Executive: Mam please can you repeat can you repeat.
Customer: 8106.
Executive: 8105.
Customer: 86.
Executive: 86.
Customer: 2484.
Executive: 2484 8105 82 862484.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: One one one second mam I just sent you a message please check mam.
Customer: Yes got it.
Executive: So this is this is my personal number mam please save it from shubham shubham this side and in any in in future if you face any issue related to India mart related to any lead you can directly message me I will be available for you.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay mam right now I am closing the concern you will get a feedback mail please share the satisfied feedback.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay thank you so much mam thanks take care.
summary:
Concerns:

- Getting only Bangladesh related buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with employee due to delayed response.

- Facing irrelevant questions and hawala payment requests.



Resolution:

- Advised to mark irrelevant leads.

- Explained feedback message was for employee.

- Executive shared personal WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the solution.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, feedback, whatsapp, timing, irrelevant questions
